name: Ready to Roll
description:
You are a dice outcast, banished by your peers. Your crime: Match fixing a dice game in the Casino. How disgusting! You are sentenced to 10 year of solitude in the Dungeon.

Use numbers 1 to 6 as controls to roll to the exit of each room. Dodge spikes and saws, avoid pitfalls and find your way through the dangerous floors while rolling the correct sequence of numbers to keep moving aimlessly on the grey tiles of your well desserved forced vacation.

Scratch your smooth, 6-faced head to solve puzzles using your mindblowing thinking power

Let's roll!

Enjoy this small adventure, crafted in 48 hours during the Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam, by :

Johan Faas (Code, Art, Design)
Romain Belet aka Swiitsh (Sound Effects, Design)
James Curtis aka Gendo (Music)
Glenn Brooks aka Terderrer (Art)

Have fun! And don't forget that in the world of dices, 1 is opposed to 6, 2 is opposed to 5 and 3 is opposed to 4
